page.title: 05SAINT ALBAN'S CHURCH
page.content: A GROUP OF US VISITED SAINT ALBAN'S CHURCH. IT IS 78 YEARS OLD. THE PRESENT VICAR IS THE REVEREND BUNDOCK. HE HAS WORKED THERE FOR FOUR AND A HALF YEARS. THE SERVICES ARE AT 8AM. AND IO.3OAM. ON A SUNDAY MORNING. THERE USED TO BE AN EVENING SERVICE UP UNTIL 7 YEARS AGO, BUT OVER THE LAST 3O YEARS THE NUMBERS TURNING UP FOR EVENING WORSHIP HAVE DROPPED. SAINT ALBAN'S IS A CHURCH OF ENGLAND CHURCH. IT HAS A SUNDAY SCHOOL FOR CHILDREN AGED BETWEEN FOUR AND A HALF AND TEN WHERE THEY LEARN ABOUT THEIR RELIGION. IT ALSO HAS A CHOIR OF FOURTEEN. THE CHURCH FACES EAST-WEST TOWARDS THE HOLY LAND. ON AVERAGE THERE ARE BETWEEN IIO AND I5O PEOPLE IN THE CONGREGATION EACH SERVICE. 4O% OF THE CONGREGATION CONSISTS OF ELDERLY AND RETIRED PEOPLE.
